name: Whale Jason
author: Limitless95
notes:
Thanks to @Jason, this is his exact list he used in the giveaway tournament.

30 wins (13 in platinum, 17 in Legend). I played dark worlds from plat to legend 1 and then switched to SSA. I went undefeated from legend 2 to KOG without summoning Citadel Whale once! Abyss Soldier is literally the best card in the deck.
